name: Avoid using Javascript Date typecheck in AngularJS application
description: You should use the angular.isDate method instead of the default JavaScript implementation (typeof new Date() === "[object Date]"). The rule is compliant with CISQ OMG ASCRM-CWE-252-data, ASCRM-CWE-704, ASCMM-MNT-20 recommendations.
output:
Line and column for each violation 
Associated value => number of violations found
rationale: Ensure you are using the official AngularJS API, you should use the angular.isDate

qualityStandards.name: Dead code
qualityStandards.description: Number of instances where a function or method is unreferenced by any other code item in the application (the application determines the scope of the search for code items that could call a function or method element)

qualityStandards.name: Unchecked return parameter from data handling operations
qualityStandards.description: Remove instances where a function, method, procedure, stored procedure, sub-routine, etc. executes a CRUD SQL statement, yet the return code value of the action is not checked anywhere

qualityStandards.name: Incompatible data type conversion
qualityStandards.description: Remove instances where a variable, field, member, etc. is declared with a data type, and then is updated with a value from a second data type that is incompatible with the first data type
